original_text: So Moses told the people of Israel everything just as the Lord had commanded Moses.
korean_text: 모세가 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 모든 일을 이스라엘 자손에게 말하니라

sentences.original_text: So Moses told the people of Israel everything
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 모세는 이스라엘 백성에게 모든 것을 일렀다

sentences.original_text: just as the Lord had commanded Moses.
